description:
JARED BIZARRE ADVENTURES 2 LETS GOOOOOO

week 1: Worked on core mechanics (player, enemies(not finished) and prototype tiles)

week 2: there was a war literally couldn't work on it much just wrote some story scripts for the main menu characters. (most of them got removed from the game because I was too lazy to add them)

week 3: basically the same as week 2 but I also had exams at school so had to study to, all I did is improving mechanics, adding sound effect and added dialogue system.

week 4: well I had more exams but I was able to finish the main menu which required sometimes

week 5, one week remaining until SaladJam deadline: Added the first game mode (waves) which enemies spawn in waves, you need to kill them all until you die, Added UI elements, score system, improved enemies the waves mode isn't finished, later on, will add more waves with boss fights.

7/6/2021 Game submitted to SaladChefsJam (check their discord server at https://discord.gg/invite/salad).

The game is rushed sorry lol gotta alt+f4 until I will make 8/6 build which should include pause menu + death screen.

Hopefully, the game will expand to be my summer project I like to do every summer break.

 it will be my last one before I finish high school and join the military.
